name: Scary Teacher On a School 3D Simulator
name_original: Scary Teacher On a School 3D Simulator
description:
Play this 3D Horror surprise for christmas! Martindb666 have a surprise for you! A brand new mod from another game! Say hi to Scary Teacher On a School 3D Simulator in this version is the christmas theme! Expect one more update coming out in 2023...

Scary horror game escape the scary teacher and collect 8 treasures. But wtach out for the scary teacher, becuause he is very spoopy and will try to catch you.

Credits to Awecom to make Baldina's Basis.
